mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item(category_id, item_sell_status, item_gubun, item_name, price, stock_number, item_detail) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{itemSellStatus}, #{itemGubun}, #{itemName}, #{price}, #{stockNumber}, #{itemDetail})
INSERT INTO item_img (uuid, item_id, file_name, ord, rep_img) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{itemId}, #{fileName}, #{ord}, #{repImg})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET category_id = #{categoryId}, item_sell_status = #{itemSellStatus}, item_gubun = #{itemGubun}, item_name = #{itemName}, price = #{price}, dc_rate = #{dcRate}, stock_number = #{stockNumber}, item_detail = #{itemDetail} WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate, ii.uuid, ii.file_name, ii.ord, ii.rep_img FROM item i LEFT JOIN item_img ii ON i.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE i.item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate, ii.uuid, ii.file_name, ii.ord, ii.rep_img FROM item i LEFT JOIN item_img ii ON i.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE i.item_gubun = #{itemGubun} ORDER BY i.regdate DESC Limit 4

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item WHERE item_gubun = #{itemGubun}
AND item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
AND item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate, ii.uuid, ii.file_name, ii.ord, ii.rep_img FROM item i LEFT JOIN item_img ii ON i.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%')

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate, ii.uuid, ii.file_name, ii.ord, ii.rep_img FROM item i LEFT JOIN item_img ii ON i.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%') OR i.item_detail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTerm}, '%')

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate, ii.uuid, ii.file_name, ii.ord, ii.rep_img FROM item i LEFT JOIN item_img ii ON i.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE i.price BETWEEN #{minPrice} AND #{maxPrice}

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate, ii.uuid, ii.file_name, ii.ord, ii.rep_img FROM item i LEFT JOIN item_img ii ON i.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE i.item_sell_status = #{itemSellStatus}

SELECT i.item_id, i.category_id, i.item_sell_status, i.item_gubun, i.item_name, i.price, i.stock_number, i.item_detail, i.dc_rate, i.regdate, i.moddate, ii.uuid, ii.file_name, ii.ord, ii.rep_img FROM item i LEFT JOIN item_img ii ON i.item_id = ii.item_id
